lines.text: [boxing Jason]
Go ahead. Take your best show, motherfucker.
[Jason punches his head right off]
Look, you don't understand. There is a maniac trying to kill us.
Welcome to New York.
Aw man! This place is aching for a video! Wayne you're an asshole!

[Jason kicks a gang's boom-box out of his way]
You're deadmeat, slimebag!
[Jason turns to the gang and lifts his mask]
Yo, man. It's cool. It's cool, man. It's cool.
[the gang runs off]
I was able to find some shit from the halls and game room. Go ahead, take what you want.
[Everyone takes something but Julius]
Well what are you gonna take, Julius?
Nothing...
[Everyone glares]
...but this gun.
Walking corpses are not real.
Oh, yeah? Yeah, well, these dead bodies are sure enough real, all right.
[first lines]

[narration]
It's like this... We live in claustrophobia, the land of steel & concrete. Trapped by dark waters. There is no escape. Nor do we want it. We've come to thrive on it and each other. You can't get the adrenaline pumpin' without the terror, good people... I love this town.

[to Jason, after watching his friend die whilst attempting to rape Rennie]
Who the fuck are you?
[Jason just stands there]
You're dead, fuckhead.
[pulls out gun, shoots Jason six times]
[as gun clicks empty, his face is slammed on a steam pipe and burned]
You're all gonna die. You're the last ones. He's come back for you.
What are you talking about?
Jason Voorhees.
You're insane. Jason Voorhees has been dead for years.
He came up the river and he's gotten on board. He walks this ship here and now.
Yeah, a killer walks this ship all right, and it's certainly none of us!
[pulls out a knife]
You're the one who's insane.
Hello, Charles.
Colleen. You know, this cruise was your idea, so at the very least you can show up on time.
Has everyone checked in?
No. Jim Miller and Suzi Donaldson never showed up, and I'm more than a little concerned.
Well, don't be. They probably decided to explore each other rather than New York.

[disgusted]
Oh, that's nice.
You know, long lady, you've been coming out here every summer for the last three years and you still haven't learned how to swim.
I'll take some lessons this time. I promise.

Now, that's what you said last year. I think the time has come for your first swimming lesson. You don't wanna end up drowning like that Voorhees boy, do you? He never learned how to swim, either. And he's still at the bottom of this lake.
He is not.
Yes, indeed, he is. And he's ready to pull down anybody who falls in and can't swim.
You're telling a lie.
Am I? Let's find out.
[pushes her into the water]
Better swim, Rennie, before Jason pulls you down.
Mommy! Don't let me drown! Mommy!
[after finding the dead bodies of some of the crew]
Now I saw we regroup and let's go find this motherfucker before he finds us, huh? Are you with me?
Watch your mouth, young man! And you'll do no such thing. I'm in charge here!
School is out, McCulloch. Okay?
[before finding the dead Julius]
The first order of business is to find Julius.
Oh, I'm sure he'll just pop up somewhere.
Senior predictions started five minutes ago and Rennie isn't there.
Maybe some of us don't want our futures predicted.
In your case, I'm sure that's true.
[just before he gets a sauna rock in his chest]
Nice fight, Julius. Guess I gotta work on my left-right-left combo.
Oh, man. Don't tell me you're still trying to scam on Tamara. How long have we known each other? Don't be a dweeb, Wayne. She's not interested in you, only what you can do for her. She is a user.
She's sexy.
So what? So is this guitar.
Facing your fear doesn't always conquer it.
We've already thought about that. Nobody could possible see a flare gun in this storm.
There's only one person who needs to see it. I'm gonna find that deck hand.
What about the fire?
How do you know there really is one?
What are you talking about?
Use some common sense. Setting off a fire alarm causes panic, the same kind of panic caused by suggesting that Jason Voorhees is alive and aboard this ship. Enough is enough.
[last lines]
Toby!
You are in very big trouble, young lady... And *you*, you can forget about getting into any film school!

[to himself, right before starting a boxing match with Jason]
Use the combos, keep the feet light. This is it.
Julius is the only senior I would even consider doing it with.

[Before cutting the drugs]
Night time is the right time.
Forget about it, Suzi. The guy's dead now, somewhere at the bottom of this lake if you believe the stories.
What stories?

There was this boy named Jason Voorhees who drowned in Crystal Lake about 30 years ago. None of the counselors heard him. A bunch of years went by, and everyone forgot about it. And that's when the murders started to happen.
Jason did it?

His mother blamed the counselors for her son's death, and she tried to kill them all, but she got her head chopped off by one of them. Legend has it that Jason came back to get even, vowing to kill every teenager in the area. And every now and then, the murders just start up. Forget about it, Suzi. They're just stories.
I hear the crew members are cute guys in their twenties.
Really?
I'm sure we'll have no problem getting them to party with us... especially with this.
[unzips her purse revealing a packet of cocaine]
It's a graduation gift from Daddy. It cost a thousand bucks but it's the best.
He bought you that?
More or less. It's part of my college fund.
